meta.content: We Miss You Video from the BES Teachers

a.title: We Miss You Video from the BES Teachers

h2.a: We Miss You Video from the BES Teachers

div.p: BES, We Miss You! Please click this link to see a We Miss You Video from Teachers BES, te extrañamos! Haga clic en este enlace para ver un video de los maestros que lo extrañamos

During the school closure, our food vendor, Simplified Culinary Services, will be providing grab and go packaged breakfast and lunch to all children ages 18 and under between 11:30am-12:30pm. Children can pick up lunch daily in the front of the school building. Each child will have a choice of a deli of the day sandwich…

meta.content: Altice USA Brings Free Broadband to K-12 and College Students During Coronavirus Pandemic

a.title: Altice USA Brings Free Broadband to K-12 and College Students During Coronavirus Pandemic

h2.a: Altice USA Brings Free Broadband to K-12 and College Students During Coronavirus Pandemic

div.p: Mar 13, 2020Source: https://www.alticeusa.com/news/articles/feature/corporate/altice-usa-brings-free-broadband-k-12-and-college-students-during-coronavirus-pandemic In response to the COVID-19/coronavirus pandemic, Altice USA has taken several steps to ensure that Americans within the communities we serve have reliable access to high-speed broadband connectivity to keep them connected to the people, information, and resources they rely on. Altice USA is committed to helping schools and students stay…

March 12, 2020 Dear Parents/Guardians, As you know, we have been sending letters home with information relevant to COVID-19 and its impact on our school. I want to reiterate that the health and safety of our students and staff are always our highest priority. As mentioned in my letter from yesterday, BES will continue to…

Board of Education Fax: (732) 681-8709

div.div: Powered by SchoolPresser - WordPress for Schools

BES, We Miss You! Please click this link to see a We Miss You Video from Teachers
BES, te extrañamos! Haga clic en este enlace para ver un video de los maestros que lo extrañamos
We will be posting all updates regarding Belmar Elementary School Health Updates to our web page. You may visit https://belmar.k12.nj.us/health/ at any time to see all notices, letters, updates, plans, etc.
You may also get to the page by selecting from the main menu About Our School > Health Updates
Publicaremos todas las actualizaciones relacionadas con las actualizaciones de salud de la escuela primaria de Belmar en nuestra página web. Puede visitar https://belmar.k12.nj.us/health/ en cualquier momento para ver todos los avisos, cartas, actualizaciones, planes, etc.
También puede acceder a la página seleccionando en el menú principal Acerca de nuestra escuela > Actualizaciones de salud
